page.title: 05A DAY FOR NEIL KINGDON
page.content: Neil is a science teacher at Stockingford Middle School,Nuneaton. He wakes at 6.55a.m.and usually has breakfast of either cornflakes or weetabix,and then has toast and marmalade.He sets off for school at 8.20a.m.,and gets a lift with a colleague,or drives himself in his red Peugeot 205.He teaches science to most of the 16 classes in the school.On Friday afternoon he teaches games to the fourth year children,even though he is not very keen on sport!He also teaches maths. to the top set of the fourth year on most mornings up to playtime(10.30a.m.).School finishes at 3.30p.m.,and he leaves for home at 3.45p.m.Among his hobbies he enjoys gardening,d.i.y.,photography,singing and sketching.He enjoys cooked meals, especially foreign dishes.At home his wife does most of the cooking.
